texts.value: Receptor for oxytocin. The activity of this receptor is mediated by G proteins which activate a phosphatidylinositol-calcium second messenger system
Belongs to the G-protein coupled receptor 1 family. Vasopressin/oxytocin receptor subfamily

citation.title: Structure and expression of a human oxytocin receptor.
cDNA clones of human proteins involved in signal transduction sequenced by the Guthrie cDNA resource center (www.cdna.org).
